title: Ghost should ramp up faster or something. It needs some tweaking.
body: Ghost feels terrible, it barely even gets the job done. Honestly when was the last time you saw someone use this spell? Flash, teleport, ignite, and even barrier are all infinitely superior.

replies.body: unless its {{champion:122}} or {{champion:120}} not much tbh, its a joke summoner at this point. only one taken more rarely is cleanse.
Ghost is fine. It's a tech choice on split push top laners. The reason it isn't played on mid anymore is because phase rush does the same thing. If Riot wanted summoner diversity they'd tweak them.

> Ghost is fine. It's a tech choice on split push top laners. The reason it isn't played on mid anymore is because phase rush does the same thing. If Riot wanted summoner diversity they'd tweak them.

No, the reason it's not taken on mid, or on as many champs in general was because of the nerf that gave it build it up time, specifically in mid, it takes too long to build up.

Well that and ignite got buffed meaning you kinda need direct combat boosts rather than movespeed to help chase/escape.

Only other non combat option is TP but then you kinda will try to avoid fights(in lane) and just farm instead in my experience.

I only use it on Predator Celerity {{champion:27}}  {{item:3117}} {{item:3285}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:3137}} {{item:3306}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3907}}  cause it oneshots practically anything, keeps me tanky enough, and lets me murder anyone with a couple button presses :^)

Honestly should not even touch Ghost right now and instead work on other summoners.
I feel like Ghost is where it should be because it's still picked on things like Darius Olaf Hec and such which were the main champions that picked this summoner...
I see it every time I play against a Darius and half the time vs Singed.
I feel like a problem is because the ignite buffs
unless you play champs that totally rely on being faster than fuck like {{champion:72}} or {{champion:27}}  then its pretty lame
I think {{champion:27}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:120}} are the only champions I regularly use it on. The ramp up time is pretty bad.
I take it on trynd. I think it needs a longer duration.
Add in a ghostblade there, it adds 40 MS out of combat and the active is there too.

I agree it needs some more immediate help in the movespeed department. Issue is with champs like hecarim and WW it being useful immediately can be abusive. Though tbh id rather ghost be OP than flash be used. Flash can die in a fire.

Maybe it's just me but what's wrong with niche summoner spells? Everyone is only going to choose the strongest spells to begin with and flash is already hard balanced into the game so that leaves one option left.

And no, if ghost is good it doesn't beat out flash, it gets taken with flash and makes wherever it is far too safe.
